Sentencas: The Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) can generate electrical power by using coal-derived syngas as the fuel.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: However, trace contamination of phosphine (PH3) in the syngas can cause irreversible degradation in cell performance.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: A series of tests at 10 ppm PH3 in the fuel gas was carried out under a variety of operating conditions, viz, with/without electrochemical reaction in syngas and with/without H2O in H-2 fuel at 750 degrees C, 800 degrees C and 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: The poisoning effects were evaluated by both electrochemical methods and chemical analyses.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: The post-mortem analyses of the SOFC anode were performed by means of XRD, SEM/EDS, and XPS.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: The results show that the degradation rate is larger at the higher cell working temperature using syngas with PH3 in a 200 h test though PH3 is more reactive with Ni in the anode at lower working temperature and produces a secondary nickel phosphide (NixPy) phase.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: The dominant compositions of NixPy on the cell anode are Ni5P2 with the presence of H2O, and Ni12P5 without the presence of H2O.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: The production of NixPy can be generated on the cell anode using syngas or dry H-2 fuel with 10 ppm PH3 contaminant.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions

Sentencas: Further, the appearance of NixPy phases is independent of the electrochemical reactions in the cell.
Titulo: Effect of PH3 poisoning on a Ni-YSZ anode-supported solid oxide fuel cell under various operating conditions
